title: Bug 110566 - Unexpected data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for 'row[0]'
description: When setting a filter for the data set using the expression 'row[0] equals to 0', it either returns an incorrect result set or no result set at all.
OB: When setting a filter using the expression 'row[0] equals to 0' and clicking on the 'Preview' tab, the first result record is returned, which is unexpected.
EB: When setting an invalid filter expression, a relevant error message should pop up to indicate that the expression is invalid.
SR: 1. Open the data set configuration. 2. Set a filter using the expression 'row[0] equals to '. 3. Click on the 'Preview' tab.
